## defer() function

Returns a new Deferred object.

A Deferred object is an object containing 3 properties: `resolve`<!-- -->, `reject` and `promise`<!-- -->. The `resolve` function resolves the `promise`<!-- -->. The `reject` function rejects the `promise`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function defer<T>(): Deferred<T>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[Deferred](./promizr.deferred.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;
